desc: 60% all parameters (Water), 175% spark damage (Water), add to BB/SBB (probability of purging spark damage reduction from all foes (PvP modes only)), raises Atk limit to 180k & 150% Atk when HP is below 50%
lore:
"There are few words that can encapsulate the grief and anguish of losing a beloved parent. This pure, concentrated fury drives the sisters Hilda and Ren√©, two of the Seven Demonlords, to seek vengeance against the King, whom they believed the perpetrator of their father's death. Spurred on by Elhaza, they bring down biting winds and piercing icicles upon all who stand in their way.

Revenge, after all, is a dish best served ice-cold."
name: Sisters' Fury
